                           Release Notes

Comments :
All the worldwide children of less than nine years fall in a coma at the same 
time. Ten years later, Tom Russel is released from prison after killing a 
man in a fight, and returns to his home town, more specifically to his older 
brother&#039;s home, who has a son in coma. Tom intends to rebuild his life, but his 
ex-wife Jean Raynor is hurt and does not want to see him. During the night, 
all the children wake up in a violent mood, killing all the adults. A group 
of survivors, led by Tom and Jean, try to escape to the safety of a base 
located 60 km outside the town.

Director : Hal Masonberg

Writers: Hal Masonberg
         Teal Minton
